channel.title: Comments on: Episode #57: Future of a Shared Economy

item.title: By: Petty
item.dc:creator: Petty
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-57/#comment-213">Robert</a>.
Yeah, thanks for that! We actually discuss BTC relay a bit in the most recent episode.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Robert.

Yeah, thanks for that! We actually discuss BTC relay a bit in the most recent episode.

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: Great show! You might want to look into BTC Relay if you haven't for a deployed example of a way in which BTC and Ethereum can interoperate.
item.content:encoded: Great show! You might want to look into BTC Relay if you haven’t for a deployed example of a way in which BTC and Ethereum can interoperate.

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: Great episode, good explanations. Really liked the music at the end.
item.content:encoded: Great episode, good explanations. Really liked the music at the end.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: I had no idea the crowd sale started. Thanks for the episode.
item.content:encoded: I had no idea the crowd sale started. Thanks for the episode.
